item.title: JSXGraph & LiaScript ... a Perfect Match
item.description: As you know, LiaScript is an extension for Markdown that was developed as a language for easy and decentralized creation of interactive online coursesâ€”in short, a language for OER.

item.title: Fischbestimmer - FISHIDENTIFIER
item.description: This is an experiment of porting the FISHIDENTIFIER from the Deutsches Meeresmuseeum Stralsund to LiaScript.
